title: Rosave Rosave Lyrics Kuberan
stanzas:
Rosave rosave
en veettu rosave
naan paadum sangeetham
kaetkaamal thoongaathe

Rosave rosave
en veettu rosave
naan paadum sangeetham
kaetkaamal thoongaathe

Varugindra sogangal
nirandharam illaye
siragugal sari endraal
vaanam pakkamthaan

naettirundha megangal
indru vaanil kidayaadhu
indru vandha sogangal
naalai ennai thodaraadhu

Rosave rosave
en veettu rosave
naan paadum sangeetham
kaetkaamal thoongaathe

pani peitha neerile
malai moolgi pogumaa
kalangaamal vazhkiren
kaalam kaikoodum.

bayam kondu vaadinaal
payan yaedhum illaye
puyal pola maaruven
paasam en vedham

gopurathin kalasathil
etcham idum kaagangal
aana podhum saamikku
vandha dhillai kopangal

Rosave rosave
en veettu rosave
naan paadum sangeetham
kaetkaamal thoongaathe
